name: geoext3-ws
description: [WIP] Learn how to use GeoExt3 in your ExtJS applicationsâ€¦

scripts.start: mkdirp src/_book && parallelshell "node scripts/sync-exercises.js" "npm run doc:serve"
scripts.doc:epub: npm run check:calibre && gitbook epub src build/geoext3-ws.epub
scripts.doc:pdf: npm run check:calibre && gitbook pdf src build/geoext3-ws.pdf
scripts.build:html: npm run clean && npm run doc:build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run doc:pdf && npm run doc:epub
scripts.build:covers: npm run build:cover && npm run build:cover_small
scripts.archive: npm run check:zip && npm run build:all && cd build && zip -r geoext3-ws.zip geoext3-ws *.epub *.pdf
